title: Will there be any more prestige skins unlocked using 100 prestige points?
body:
I've recently bought the pass for the prestige {{champion:51}} skin but after seeing it used in game, I'm having second thoughts.
Will there be more prestige skins later this year which will be unlocked using the 100 prestige points or will I have to make a choice between the ones that are out now?

replies.body: There will be more yes, but we won't have any details in advance.

Are we able to trade in tokens from Arcade to PROJECT or will I have to get the 100 prestige points and hope it's a skin that I like?
I think that Irelia skin does look quite nice but I'm hoping that the prestige points would unlock something better later on in the year.

Tokens are specific to the event they are earned in, so you'll have to go the prestige points route if that's what you want. I believe prestige points expire at the end of each year so, not sure if that changes things for you.

Ah alright thank you.
Do you guys know roughly when the next prestige point skin will be released?
With the new PROJECT skins. I believe it's PROJECT Irelia that's getting the prestige. Past that, keeping an eye on PBE is going to be your best bet.
whats sad is our collected points get removed at the start of each year they should remain perminant like Gems
